mapper.insert: insert into base_log (id, log_code, log_context, name, create_time, is_deleted, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update base_log set log_code = #{logCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, log_context = #{logContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, log_code, log_context, name, create_time, is_deleted, update_time from base_log
